{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=TM522G |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/29/2006 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem, wireless router |fcc_id=UID-WRMTM5 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand=Marvell |cpu2_model=88W8510;88W8510-BAN1, AGYG22.7, 0553 B2P, TW P; |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2=4 MiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510;88W8510-BAN1, AGYG22.7, 0553 B2P, TW P; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6061;88E6061-LAG1, BP071308.3, 0602 A1P, TW; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} The UID-WRMTM5 FCC ID is for, presumably, the stand-alone wireless router module used in this device (T522 WRM). :The module is '''SerComm''' manuf'ed - "YAT00A-1.0MM" is silkscreened on its board.
The FCC docs for the module indicate the main unit is PUMA based.
